Html: Has anyone had success with implementing their own line chart into this library?
I have used these charts in the past and I'm about to start a new project that requires a line chart...

I ended up using this library for my gauges and bar charts and the wpf toolkit data visualization for my line graphs with styles to make them look like they came from this library. I don't have enough experience with custom controls to take on such a big task.

Would be interested to see your implementation if you end up tackling it.
As would I. How did you get on?
